verses.verse: And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

On the first <S%H7223><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> of the first <S%H259><s%> month <S%H2320><s%> shall you set up <S%H6965><s%> the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> of the tent <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>.
And you shall put <S%H7760><s%> in it <S%H8033><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the testimony <S%H5715><s%>, and cover <S%H5526><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> with the veil <S%H6532><s%>.

And you shall bring <S%H935><s%> in the table <S%H7979><s%>, and set in order <S%H6186><s%> the things that are to be set in order <S%H6187><s%> upon it <S%H935><s%>; and you shall bring in the lampstand <S%H4501><s%>, and light <S%H5927><s%> the lamps there <S%H5216><s%>.

And you shall set <S%H5414><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%> for the incense <S%H7004><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the testimony <S%H5715><s%>, and put <S%H7760><s%> the hanging <S%H4539><s%> of the door <S%H6607><s%> to the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%>.

And you shall set <S%H5414><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%> of the burnt offering <S%H5930><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> of the tent <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>.

And you shall set <S%H5414><s%> the basin <S%H3595><s%> between the tent <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%> and the altar <S%H4196><s%>, and shall put <S%H5414><s%> water in it <S%H4325><s%>.
And you shall set up <S%H7760><s%> the court <S%H2691><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%>, and hang up <S%H5414><s%> the hanging <S%H4539><s%> at the court <S%H2691><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%>.

And you shall take <S%H3947><s%> the anointing <S%H4888><s%> oil <S%H8081><s%>, and anoint <S%H4886><s%> the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%>, and all that is in it <S%H6942><s%>, and shall hallow it <S%H3627><s%>, and all the vessels there and it shall be holy <S%H6944><s%>.

And you shall anoint <S%H4886><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%> of the burnt offering <S%H5930><s%>, and all his vessels <S%H3627><s%>, and sanctify <S%H6942><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%>: and it shall be an altar <S%H4196><s%> most <S%H6944><s%> holy <S%H6944><s%>.
And you shall anoint <S%H4886><s%> the basin <S%H3595><s%> and his foot <S%H3653><s%>, and sanctify it <S%H6942><s%>.

And you shall bring <S%H7126><s%> Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> unto the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>, and wash <S%H7364><s%> them with water <S%H4325><s%>.

And you shall put <S%H3847><s%> upon Aaron <S%H175><s%> the holy <S%H6944><s%> garments <S%H899><s%>, and anoint <S%H4886><s%> him <S%H6942><s%>, and sanctify him <S%H3547><s%>; that he may minister unto me in the priest's office.
And you shall bring <S%H7126><s%> his sons <S%H1121><s%>, and clothe <S%H3847><s%> them with coats <S%H3801><s%>:

And you shall anoint <S%H4886><s%> them <S%H4886><s%>, as you did anoint their father <S%H1><s%>, that they may minister unto me in the priest <S%H3547><s%>'s office: for their anointing <S%H4888><s%> shall surely be an everlasting <S%H5769><s%> priesthood <S%H3550><s%> throughout their generations <S%H1755><s%>.
Thus did <S%H6213><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%>: according to all that the Lord <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> him <S%H6213><s%>, so did he.

And it came to pass in the first <S%H7223><s%> month <S%H2320><s%> in the second <S%H8145><s%> year <S%H8141><s%>, on the first <S%H259><s%> day of the month <S%H2320><s%>, that the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> was reared up <S%H6965><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> reared up <S%H6965><s%> the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%>, and fastened <S%H5414><s%> his sockets <S%H134><s%>, and set up <S%H7760><s%> the boards <S%H7175><s%> there <S%H5414><s%>, and put in the bars <S%H1280><s%> there <S%H6965><s%>, and reared up his pillars <S%H5982><s%>.

And he spread abroad <S%H6566><s%> the tent <S%H168><s%> over the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%>, and put <S%H7760><s%> the covering <S%H4372><s%> of the tent <S%H168><s%> above <S%H4605><s%> upon it <S%H3068><s%>; as the Lord commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%>.

And he took <S%H3947><s%> and put <S%H5414><s%> the testimony <S%H5715><s%> into the ark <S%H727><s%>, and set <S%H7760><s%> the poles <S%H905><s%> on the ark <S%H727><s%>, and put <S%H5414><s%> the mercy seat <S%H3727><s%> above <S%H4605><s%> upon the ark <S%H727><s%>:

And he brought <S%H935><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> into the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%>, and set up <S%H7760><s%> the veil <S%H6532><s%> of the covering <S%H4539><s%>, and covered <S%H5526><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the testimony <S%H5715><s%>; as the Lord <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%>.

And he put <S%H5414><s%> the table <S%H7979><s%> in the tent <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>, upon the side <S%H3409><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> northward <S%H6828><s%>, outside <S%H2351><s%> the veil <S%H6532><s%>.
And he set <S%H6187><s%> the bread <S%H3899><s%> in order <S%H6186><s%> upon it before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>; as the Lord <S%H3068><s%> had commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%>.

And he put <S%H7760><s%> the lampstand <S%H4501><s%> in the tent <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>, over against <S%H5227><s%> the table <S%H7979><s%>, on the side <S%H3409><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> southward <S%H5045><s%>.
And he lit <S%H5927><s%> the lamps <S%H5216><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>; as the Lord <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%>.
And he put <S%H7760><s%> the golden <S%H2091><s%> altar <S%H4196><s%> in the tent <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the veil <S%H6532><s%>:
And he burnt <S%H6999><s%> sweet <S%H5561><s%> incense <S%H7004><s%> on it as the Lord <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%>.
And he set up <S%H7760><s%> the hanging <S%H4539><s%> at the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%>.

And he put <S%H7760><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%> of burnt offering <S%H5930><s%> by the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> of the tent <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>, and offered <S%H5927><s%> upon it the burnt offering <S%H5930><s%> and the food offering <S%H4503><s%>; as the Lord <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%>.

And he set <S%H7760><s%> the basin <S%H3595><s%> between the tent <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%> and the altar <S%H4196><s%>, and put <S%H5414><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> there <S%H7364><s%>, to wash with.
And Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> washed <S%H7364><s%> their hands <S%H3027><s%> and their feet there <S%H7272><s%>

When they went <S%H935><s%> into the tent <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>, and when they came near <S%H7126><s%> unto the altar <S%H4196><s%>, they washed <S%H7364><s%>; as the Lord <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%>.

And he reared up <S%H6965><s%> the court <S%H2691><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%> the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> and the altar <S%H4196><s%>, and set up <S%H5414><s%> the hanging <S%H4539><s%> of the court <S%H2691><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%>. So Moses <S%H4872><s%> finished <S%H3615><s%> the work <S%H4399><s%>.

Then a cloud <S%H6051><s%> covered <S%H3680><s%> the tent <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>, and the glory <S%H3519><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> filled <S%H4390><s%> the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> was not able <S%H3201><s%> to enter <S%H935><s%> into the tent <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>, because the cloud <S%H6051><s%> lived <S%H7931><s%> on it <S%H3519><s%>, and the glory of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> filled <S%H4390><s%> the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%>.

And when the cloud <S%H6051><s%> was taken up <S%H5927><s%> from <S%H5921><s%> over the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%>, the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> went onward <S%H5265><s%> in all their journeys <S%H4550><s%>:
But if the cloud <S%H6051><s%> were not taken up <S%H5927><s%>, then they journeyed <S%H5265><s%> not until the day <S%H3117><s%> that it was taken up <S%H5927><s%>.

For the cloud <S%H6051><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> was upon the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> by day <S%H3119><s%>, and fire <S%H784><s%> was on it by night <S%H3915><s%>, in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of all the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, throughout all their journeys <S%H4550><s%>.
